name: Kappa to Reggie
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Changes the Kappa face emote into a Reggie face emote! :P Reggie emote created by me (CodyMKW) ATTENTION: This style REQUIRES BTTV to function properly. If you do not have BTTV, you will not see the Reggie face. Get BTTV at: http://www.nightdev.com/betterttv

user.name: CodyMKW
user.about: Hey my name is Cody I’m 31 years old I like to play Nintendo games, and I’m a former member of the retired Splatoon team known as Squids Next Door my favorite game series are Mario Kart, Animal Crossing, and Splatoon.

obsoletion_message: Twitch changed the emotes from CSS to Javascript which broke this!
additional_info: Updates: -January 8, 2015 - Twitch changed the CSS of the Kappa which broke the style I updated to fix this. -January 28, 2015 - Made the style work again but you need to use BTTV in order for it to work.
